561fa58a-fb24-4e1b-9ba7-671c1bb0bec7.text: What is the capital of France?

32b8773b-e446-49f0-b3c9-150986315bf6.text: Paris is the capital of France.

b11bccd0-889d-45f7-bfaa-21b039fbde65.text: What is the main component of air?

00113789-7a2f-49c2-b299-72d2ebe8382a.text: Nitrogen is the main component of the air we breathe.
